Unleash the Power of the Blockchain

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Let’s Get Started” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#58BA52″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#2f8f83″ button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” custom_margin=”48px||48px” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”62px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”65%” module_alignment=”center”]

Remember the bad old days: when your data was unsecure on a centralized ledgar. We engineered Brightscout to let your business start building on the blockchain and build on scale.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.5″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg-ornament.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_right”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” custom_css_main_1=”margin: auto auto 0;” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on” custom_css_main=”margin: auto auto 0;”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/2nd-Section-Illustration.svg” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” animation_style=”fade”]

technology with a vision

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”38px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” animation_style=”fade”]

No matter how good the idea sounds or how confident our client is, we put the app through a rigorous vetting process, polishing and streamlining the idea along the way.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” animation_style=”fade”]

Once we’ve properly reviewed an idea, it’s time for our builder bees to get to work. From designing a logo and brand identity through development and launch, our in-house specialists spring into action.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19.5″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/left-bg-ornament.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Built to Do Business

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Good Ideas, Deserve Perfect Execution

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.9″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Sure, we have a great product development process but more importantly we understand that we’re only as good as our team and our training. At Brightscout we take immense pride in hiring only the best and building a hive of innovation and sharing of ideas. These efforts lead to a flawless execution of your product strategy.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”dotted-line-divide” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-light.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ animation_style=”flip” animation_direction=”bottom”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_6_font=”|600|||||||” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”1px” text_orientation=”center”]

Problem Solvers

Build game changing apps

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” height=”0px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”15%” custom_margin=”||” custom_padding=”||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_width_px=”1236px” use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_margin=”40px||40px||true” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Smart Contracts” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-Smart-Contracts.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″]

Empower users with contracts written in code and bounded by immutable logic.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Cryptocurrency” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-ryptocurrency.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″ text_font=”||||||||”]

Unleash resources and create opportunity with your own custom branded digital tokens.

Implement the various capabilities of blockchain in numerous verticals.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_margin=”40px||40px||true” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Hyperledger” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-hyperledger.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″]

Advance cross-industry blockchain technologies with the open-source blockchain community.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Supply Chain” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-chain.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″ text_font=”||||||||”]

Eliminate the friction and tackle funding delays with an end-to-end cash-flow solution.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Smart Wallets” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-wallet.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″ text_font=”||||||||”]

Elevate the purchasing experience with deep data insights directly in the sales channel.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_margin=”40px||40px||true” _builder_version=”3.19.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Crowdsale” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-rowdsale.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″]

Crowdfunding just got more secure with transactions blocked by the blockchain.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Fintech” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-currency.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″ text_font=”||||||||”]

Disrupt traditional financial institutions with innovative blockchain technology.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.19.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”Custom App Type” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/ico-puzzle.svg” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”22px” custom_margin=”||8px”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.2″ text_font=”||||||||”]

Have a new innovative idea for a blockchain app nobody has thought of? Sounds like our thing!
